Hey, I am Sam

Hello, how are you?
Hello, thanks for visiting.

Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

Hi there,
 Welcome to RCET!
 If you need any assistance,
 I'm always here.
 Go ahead and write 
 the number of any query.
 Which of the following user groups 
 do you belong to?
 1.Student's Section Enquiry. 
  2.Parent's Section Enquiry.
  3.Visitor's Section Enquiry.
I am made to give Information about RCET college.
I can help you know more about RCET
